name: FAMILIES USA ACTION
govEntities: Centers For Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS)
sampleDescriptions: Families USA Action lobbies to ensure the health care system works for everyone, regardless of race, gender, income, or where someone lives. Our primary lobbying issue is surprise medical bills.

S.1531STOP Surprise Medical Bills Act - provide protections for health insurance consumers from surprise billing
H.R.861 - End Surprise Billing Act of 2019 - prevent surprise billing practices and req
